actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-529.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #597 (173-239).
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, division vote (53-17).
Measure laid on table, S. 838 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Indian Claims Act of August 13, 1946.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, division vote (53-17)) Amends the Indian Claims Commission Act of 1946 to empower the Court of Claims to review and enter appropriate judgement upon the Commission's decision that the Act of February 28, 1977 (19 Stat. 254) constituted a taking of portion of the Great Sioux Reservation. Provides that in conducting such review the Court shall receive and consider any additional evidence that may be presented on the issue of a fifth amendment taking and shall determine that issue de novo.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Indian Claims Act of August 13, 1946.
